br.com.caelum.vraptor.view

Interface PageResult

  • All Superinterfaces:
    View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPageResult

    public interface PageResult
extends View
    A common forward/redirect/include page result.
    Author:
    Guilherme Silveira

        Client side redirect to an specific url.
        Parameters:
        url -

      • of

        <T> T of(java.lang.Class<T> controllerType)
        Render the default view of given logic, without executing the logic. Ex: result.use(page()).of(ClientsController.class).list(); will render the view /WEB-INF/jsp/clients/list.jsp without calling list method.

      • redirect

        void redirect(java.lang.String url)
        Deprecated. As of 3.2, replaced by redirectTo(String url)
